title: Rice and raisin breakfast pudding
ingredients: ['400ml (14 fl oz) water', '200g (7 oz) uncooked brown rice', '85g (3 oz) sultanas', '4 tablespoons maple syrup', '225ml (8 fl oz) unsweetened soya milk', '60g (2 oz) toasted and chopped almonds', '1 teaspoon ground cinnamon', '1/2 teaspoon ground cardamom']
